title: Bug 5473 - ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473 - ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces. Build 200110251.
OB: When executing the ShiftLeft command on lines containing a mix of tabs and spaces in a default text editor
EB: The lines should be indented to the left, moving all the text to the left by one tab or four spaces
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a default text editor
2. Type in the following lines: <space><tab>some text
<tab>some text
3. Highlight the two lines and execute the ShiftLeft command
4. Observe that nothing happens and the lines are not indented
